author: amaltaro
body:
In addition to bringing WMCore services to `1.4.2.pre7`, which has a few bug fixes; I also dropped the WMAgent dependency on `py2-mysql`, such that we can make sure our code no longer needs it.

TODO (in a different PR): T0 still needs to have that dependency dropped; and CRABServer needs to be investigated.
title: WMCore 1.4.2.pre7 release candidate for HG2011; drop py2-mysqldb
